did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Hoover Institution on War, Revolution, and Peace

did.abstract: Telegrams sent and received, relating to Polish-Italian relations. A digital copy of this entire collection is available at http://szukajwarchiwach.pl/800/34/0/-/.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Poland. Ambasada (Italy) telegrams, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Increments may have been received since this finding aid was prepared. Please check Stanford University's online catalog Socrates at http://library.stanford.edu/webcat to find the full extent of the collection.

altformavail.head: Alternative Forms Available
altformavail.p: Digital copy in Poland's National Digital Archive at http://szukajwarchiwach.pl/800/34/0/-/. It was digitized from microfilm by the Polish State Archives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of secret correspondence sent and received by the Polish embassy in Italy in 1938, relating to Polish-Italian relations during that year of increasing international tension.
These telegrams and letters were formerly part of the Polish Foreign Ministry collection, acquired by the Hoover Archives in 1959, and were accessioned in the early 1990s as a separate collection.
A microfilm copy of these materials has been deposited in the State Archives of Poland in Warsaw.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the repository's online public access catalog.

scopecontent.p: Logbook of incoming and outgoing telegrams and letters
Logbook of incoming and outgoing telegrams and letters
